theisisthompson: what is COP25? excuse my uneducatedness
heidibeach: @theisisthompson most people don´t know, so its good that your asking. Maybe I can contribute. COP stands for Conference of the Parties, "parties" refer to the countries of the world. It is more commonly refered to as the United Nations Climate Conference. This year it will be the 25th since the first one was held in Berlin in 1995. The countries negotiate new climate agreements on which they have to act at a national level. Whereas most COP´s have failed to implement good environmental and climate standards the Paris Agreement (2015) was seen as a big step in the right direction -agreeing on keeping the average global temperature below 2 degrees compared to pre-industrial levels. The United States of America now wants to withdraw from this agreement.

alexanderdua_: This is the most pathetic Instagram post I’ve ever seen in my life. Just fly a plane! Rather than reverting back to old, obsolete methods of travel, such as sailing, we should be coming up with greener, more efficient methods of travel. This is why I don’t agree with Greta; all she is doing is travelling the world, and participating in strikes, which, to be honest, have very little impact. In addition to the protests and strikes, all of her speeches criticize world leaders. What she should be doing is encouraging the next generation of innovators to come up with ideas that can save the planet while also save money and time. Greta needs to get her to get her act together, and give speeches like a normal person.
